# uptimekuma_notification_brevo (Resource)

Brevo notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_brevo" "example" {
  name       = "Brevo Email Alerts"
  is_active  = true
  api_key    = "your_brevo_api_key_here"
  to_email   = "alerts@example.com"
  from_email = "monitoring@example.com"
  from_name  = "Uptime Monitoring"
  subject    = "Uptime Alert Notification"
}

resource "uptimekuma_notification_brevo" "with_cc" {
  name       = "Brevo Email Alerts with CC"
  is_active  = true
  api_key    = "your_brevo_api_key_here"
  to_email   = "alerts@example.com"
  from_email = "monitoring@example.com"
  from_name  = "Uptime Monitoring"
  subject    = "Uptime Alert Notification"
  cc_email   = "team@example.com,manager@example.com"
  bcc_email  = "archive@example.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Brevo API key for authentication
- `from_email` (String) Sender email address
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `to_email` (String) Recipient email address

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `bcc_email` (String) Comma-separated list of BCC email addresses
- `cc_email` (String) Comma-separated list of CC email addresses
- `from_name` (String) Sender name
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `subject` (String) Email subject line

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
